    G L A D I AT O R

    The Gladiator is a battle-honed warrior that uses a variety of equipment to protect their allies and hinder their foes.

    TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3
    Size: 1 Save Target: 12 Size: 1 Save Target: 15 Size: 1 Save Target: 18
    Armor: 2 Initiative: 5 Armor: 2 Initiative: 5 Armor: 2 Initiative: 5
    Scope: 5 Scope: 5 Scope: 5
    ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES
    Bulk: 2 Mind: -1 Bulk: 3 Mind: -1 Bulk: 4 Mind: 0
    Agility: 1 Magic: 0 Agility: 3 Magic: 0 Agility: 4 Magic: 0
    ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES
    HP: 16 Stress Cap: 6 HP: 18 Stress Cap: 7 HP: 20 Stress Cap: 7
    Dodge: 8 A-Def: 6 Dodge: 10 A-Def: 8 Dodge: 12 A-Def: 10
    Speed: 5 MP: 2 Speed: 5 MP: 3 Speed: 6 MP: 4

    G ladiators are survivors of countless battles through which they've learned tricks and techniques that can take enemies by surprise. Their equipment influences their strategy, but the Gladiator's basic role is to stay near allies and protect them with their BOUNCE SHIELD , and move or immobilize enemies to further protect their backline. Gladiators are unable to protect their allies from auto-hit or auto-damaging abilities.

    Base Features

    REACTION

    Gladius

    FIGHT +2/4/6 VS DODGE

    MELEE WEAPON

    MAIN BLADE

    RELIABLE 3/4/5

    REACH 1 5/6/7 PHYSICAL

    Trigger: A character attacks an ally within RANGE 3 .

    Effect: The attack receives +2 .

    Spiked Shie

    l

    d

    MELEE WEAPON

    FIGHT +2/4/6 VS DODGE

    MAIN CLUB

    REACH 1 3/4/5 PHYSICAL

    On Attack: The Gladiator creates a BURST 1 zone that lasts until this weapon is destroyed or they are DISARMED , STUNNED , or until the start of the Gladiator's next turn. Allies gain resistance to Physical, Astral, Lunar, and Force from attacks or abilities that draw line of sight through this zone or the Gladiator.

    Reaction attacks with this weapon gain +1 .

    Swap

    SKILL

    MINOR ACTION

    The Gladiator swaps positions with an adjacent character. This counts as forced movement. If the Gladiator and the target are different SIZES , the Gladiator can place themselves or the target in any spaces the other occupied, as long as both remain adjacent to each other. The Gladiator can't use this ability if they are GRAPPLED , IMMOBILIZED , or SLOWED .

    Extra Features

    SKILL

    Call Out

    Glory or Death

    At the start of the Gladiator's turn, they can MARK all adjacent enemies as a free action .

    SKILL

    MANA 1, RECHARGE 5+

    Enemies within the AOE become MARKED , and receive +1 on attack rolls that don't include Gladiator as a target while they have this MARK .

    PIERCING

    Electric Net MINOR ACTION SUPPORT ITEM MAIN RECHARGE 5+ RANGE 3

    The Gladiator throws an electrically charged net at a character within RANGE . The target must make an AGILITY save. Failure: They are IMMOBILIZED until cleared. While IMMOBILIZED in this way, they are unable to perform reactions . They can clear the condition by succeeding on a BULK save as a minor action .

    Pit Fighter TRAIT

    The Gladiator's improvised weapon attacks deal 4/5/6 PHYSICAL , and their reaction attacks deal +1d6

    bonus damage

    .

    Additionally, when the Gladiator uses SHOVE , they can choose both options and can push the target up to 3 spaces .

    Ricochet Discus VOLLEY +1/3/5 VS DODGE RANGED WEAPON MAIN CLUB HOMING RANGE 5 4/5/6 PHYSICAL

    On Hit: The discus bounces, allowing the Gladiator to repeat the attack against another target within RANGE 3 of the previous target.

    This effect can trigger multiple times, but each character can only be targeted 1/turn . Characters hit by this attack receive +1 on attacks that don't include the Gladiator as a target until the end of their next turn.

    Trident FIGHT +1/3/5, +1 VS DODGE MELEE WEAPON MAIN LONGARM THROWN 5 REACH 2 / THROWN 5 5/6/7 PHYSICAL

    On Hit: The target is pinned by the weapon, and is IMMOBILIZED for the duration. The weapon can't be used to attack while pinning the target.

    The effect ends if the weapon is destroyed, the target succeeds on a BULK save as a minor action , or the Gladiator ends it as a free action . The weapon returns to the Gladiator when the effect ends.

    With an array of special bullets, the Gunner has an answer to every problem. These answers usually involve filling the air with gunfire from a safe distance.

    TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3
    Size: 1 Save Target: 10 Size: 1 Save Target: 13 Size: 1 Save Target: 16
    Armor: 0 Initiative: 7 Armor: 0 Initiative: 7 Armor: 0 Initiative: 7
    Scope: 15 Scope: 15 Scope: 15
    ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES
    Bulk: -1 Mind: 1 Bulk: -1 Mind: 2 Bulk: -1 Mind: 2
    Agility: 1 Magic: 1 Agility: 2 Magic: 2 Agility: 4 Magic: 3
    ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES
    HP: 10 Stress Cap: 6 HP: 12 Stress Cap: 7 HP: 14 Stress Cap: 8
    Dodge: 10 A-Def: 10 Dodge: 12 A-Def: 10 Dodge: 14 A-Def: 10
    Speed: 5 MP: 6 Speed: 5 MP: 8 Speed: 5 MP: 10

    G unners are long-distance fighters whose damage is dependent on their MP . As artillery units, they want to position themselves far away from any danger, leveraging their long range to keep themselves safe and stationary. Gunners can regain MP while stationary, which allows them to attack for longer before needing to recover MP . They are heavily customizable thanks to their SPECIAL BULLETS , which have a variety of effects. Effects that disarm the gunner reduce their maximum MP , too, which can weaken them during long fights.

    Base Features

    Backup Weapons

    TRAIT

    The Gunner has a number of backup weapons, allowing them to replace weapons when they're lost or destroyed. If the Gunner would be DISARMED or one of their weapons or support items would be destroyed, they instead lose 2 MP and -2 MAXIMUM MP .

    Special Bullets

    TRAIT

    1/turn before attacking, the Gunner can apply one of their equipped special bullets to one of their REPEATER attacks. Each type of special bullet must be taken as a separate extra feature and counts as a separate support item.

    Repeater VOLLEY +2/4/6 VS DODGE RANGED WEAPON LIGHT MAGITECH RANGE 20 X FORCE

    This weapon's damage is equal to the Gunner's current MP . 1/turn before attacking, the Gunner can spend 1 MP to attack twice with this weapon, choosing either the same or different targets.

    Steady Reloading

    SKILL

    At the start of the Gunner's turn, they regain 1 MP if they haven't moved since the start of their last turn.

    Extra Features

    Antimagic Field Generator MINOR ACTION SUPPORT ITEM MAIN MANA 1 RANGE = SCOPE (15/15/15), BLAST 2

    Special Bullets: Death SUPPORT ITEM LIGHT MANA 1, RECHARGE 6+

    This AOE is a zone. Characters are SILENCED while within it. The zone lasts until the Gunner uses this ability again, or is BLINDED , STUNNED , or defeated.

    SPECIAL BULLETS allows the Gunner to apply the following to REPEATER attacks:

    On Hit: The target must make a BULK save. Failure: They take 1 Wound instead of the normal damage.

    11: non-Player cHaracterS

    Special Bullets: Charm SUPPORT ITEM LIGHT MANA 1

    SPECIAL BULLETS allows the Gunner to apply the following to REPEATER attacks:

    On Hit: The target must make a MIND save. Failure: The Gunner chooses one:

    • The Gunner moves them up to their SPEED , controlling their movement, which counts as forced movement.
    • The target uses VOLLEY or FIGHT as a reaction with a weapon or technique attack of the Gunner's choice against a target of the Gunner's choice.

    Special Bullets: Dissolving SUPPORT ITEM LIGHT MANA 1

    SPECIAL BULLETS allows the Gunner to apply the following to REPEATER attacks:

    On Hit: The target is SUNDERED until cleared.

    Special Bullets: Fear SUPPORT ITEM LIGHT MANA 1

    SPECIAL BULLETS allows the Gunner to apply the following to REPEATER attacks:

    On Hit: The target is DAZED until they end their turn HIDDEN or out of the Gunner's line of sight.

    Special Bullets: Freezing SUPPORT ITEM LIGHT MANA 1

    SPECIAL BULLETS allows the Gunner to apply the following to REPEATER attacks:

    On Hit: The target must make a BULK save. Failure: They are IMMOBILIZED until the end of their next turn.

    Special Bullets: Drill SUPPORT ITEM LIGHT MANA 1

    SPECIAL BULLETS allows the Gunner to apply both of the following to REPEATER attacks:

    • On Attack: This attack ignores soft and hard cover from terrain, and gains Piercing .
    • On Hit: This attack deals double damage to Summons , objects, and terrain.

    Special Bullets: Slow SUPPORT ITEM LIGHT MANA 1

    SPECIAL BULLETS allows the Gunner to apply the following to REPEATER attacks:

    On Hit: The target is SLOWED until the end of their next turn.

    Special Bullets: Stun SUPPORT ITEM LIGHT MANA 1, RECHARGE 6+

    SPECIAL BULLETS allows the Gunner to apply the following to REPEATER attacks:

    On Hit: The target must make a BULK save. Failure: They are STUNNED until the end of their next turn.

    Special Bullets: Weakening SUPPORT ITEM LIGHT MANA 1

    SPECIAL BULLETS allows the Gunner to apply the following to REPEATER attacks:

    On Hit: The target is WEAKENED until the end of their next turn.

    GUNNER TEMPLATES

    Be cautious when combining Gunners with the Minion template, as Minions still put out the same amount of damage as non-Minions, and Gunners can deal lots of damage safely at range.

    Drain Strength

    HEALER

    The Healer keeps their allies fighting fit with curative, bolstering magic.

    TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3
    Size: 1 Save Target: 10 Size: 1 Save Target: 12 Size: 1 Save Target: 14
    Armor: 0 Initiative: 2 Armor: 0 Initiative: 2 Armor: 0 Initiative: 2
    Scope: 10 Scope: 10 Scope: 15
    ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES SCORES SCORES ABILITY SCORES SCORES SCORES
    Bulk: 0 Mind: 1 Bulk: 0 Mind: 2 Bulk: 0 Mind: 3
    Agility: 0 Magic: 1 Agility: 0 Magic: 3 Agility: 0 Magic: 5
    ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES
    HP: 10 Stress Cap: 10 HP: 12 Stress Cap: 11 HP: 14 Stress Cap: 12
    Dodge: 10 A-Def: 10 Dodge: 11 A-Def: 12 Dodge: 12 A-Def: 14
    Speed: 5 MP: 4 Speed: 5 MP: 5 Speed: 5 MP: 6

    H ealers are vulnerable support units that can keep their allies alive on the battlefield. The longer a Healer remains on the field, the more HP they can restore to their allies. To make the most of Healers, they need to be properly defended - they have little in the way of physical defenses, although their A-DEF is higher than average. Healers with the RESURRECT spell can dramatically change the momentum of a fight, especially when an Elite or Mini-Boss enemy might be brought back to the fight.

    Base Features

    Extra Features

    TRAIT

    Healing Zone

    When the Healer makes a character MARKED , that character must make a MAGIC save. Failure: They are WEAKENED until the end of their next turn.

    Dual Cast

    TRAIT

    The Healer can spend an additional +1 MP when releasing HEAL to target two characters at once.

    SPELL

    CHANNEL

    MANA 1 RANGE = SCOPE (10/10/15), BLAST 1

    On Release: This AOE is a zone. Allies that start their turn within the zone regain 4/5/6 HP . The zone lasts until the Healer is defeated or uses this ability again.

    Crossbow

    VOLLEY +1/2/3 VS DODGE

    RANGED WEAPON

    MAIN BOW

    RANGE 5 / REACH 3 5 PHYSICAL

    Advanced Targeting

    TRAIT

    When an ally within SCOPE (10/12/15) consumes a MARK , roll a d6. On a 5-6, the MARK remains.

    When the Marshal attacks with this weapon, they can attack a number of times equal to their tier.

    Extra Features

    Bracing Spear

    FIGHT +1/2/3, +1

    VS DODGE

    MELEE WEAPON MAIN LONGARM

    REACH 2 5/7/9 PHYSICAL

    Hit Them

    MINOR ACTION

    SKILL MANA 1

    RANGE = SCOPE (10/12/15)

    An ally within Range can

    VOLLEY or FIGHT .

    The Marshal can OPPORTUNITY ATTACK with this weapon when a character enters its REACH .

    Inspiring Presence

    TRAIT

    The Marshal's adjacent allies gain +2 on attacks, checks, and saves.

    Miasma Field

    CHANNEL

    SPELL MANA 1 RANGE = SCOPE (10/12/15), BLAST 1

    On Release: All enemies in the AOE take 2/3/4 STRESS and are DAZED and SLOWED until the end of their next turn.

    Move! SKILL MANA X

    PHASE SKIRMISH

    RANGE = SCOPE (10/12/15)

    For each MP spent, one ally within RANGE can move up to their SPEED .

    Priority

    MARK

    SKILL MANA 1

    RANGE = SCOPE (10/12/15)

    1d3+1 enemies within RANGE become MARKED .

    Weak Point SKILL MANA 1

    MARK

    RANGE = SCOPE (10/12/15)

    An enemy within RANGE is MARKED , takes 2 STRESS , and must make a MIND save. Failure: They are VULNERABLE to the first attack that consumes that MARK .

    Mindreavers have psionic powers that can destroy or manipulate minds.

    MINDREAVER

    TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3
    Size: 1 Save Target: 12 Size: 1 Save Target: 15 Size: 1 Save Target: 18
    Armor: 0 Initiative: 2 Armor: 0 Initiative: 2 Armor: 0 Initiative: 2
    Scope: 12 Scope: 12 Scope: 15
    ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES
    Bulk: -1 Mind: 3 Bulk: -1 Mind: 4 Bulk: -1 Mind: 6
    Agility: -1 Magic: 1 Agility: 0 Magic: 2 Agility: 0 Magic: 3
    ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES
    HP: 14 Stress Cap: 10 HP: 16 Stress Cap: 12 HP: 18 Stress Cap: 13
    Dodge: 8 A-Def: 10 Dodge: 10 A-Def: 12 Dodge: 12 A-Def: 14
    Speed: 5 MP: 4 Speed: 5 MP: 5 Speed: 5 MP: 6

    M indreavers infiltrate the minds of their foes, altering their perceptions and placing stress on their psyches. Fighting against a Mindreaver means making difficult decisions and choosing the least harmful option in the moment. Mindreavers inflict lots of Stress and can receive a lot of Stress in return, but are fragile at close range.

    Base Features

    CHANNEL

    Mind Worms

    RANGE = SCOPE (12/12/15)

    Enthrall

    SKILL

    MANA 1

    On Release: The Mindreaver moves one enemy within Range up to their SPEED . This doesn't count as forced movement. The Mindreaver can then force the target to, as a reaction by that character, attack a target chosen by the Mindreaver with a weapon or spell of the Mindreaver's choice.

    Spread Nightmare

    SKILL

    MANA 1

    MINOR ACTION

    RANGE = SCOPE (12/12/15)

    The Mindreaver chooses an enemy within Range that has some amount of Discord. All enemies adjacent to the target must make a MIND save. Failure: They are auto-hit by MIND WORMS .

    VOLLEY

    +2/4/6 VS A-DEF

    RANGED SPELL ATTACK

    AETHERIC, INDIRECT

    RANGE = SCOPE (12/12/15)

    1 DISCORD

    On Hit: The target is DAZED until they clear all Discord .

    Read Mind

    SKILL

    MANA 2

    CHANNEL

    RANGE = SCOPE (12/12/15)

    On Release: A character within RANGE takes 2 STRESS and becomes predictable , with the following effects:

    • The predictable character can't SURGE .
    • At the start of each round, the predictable character must pick the phase in which they are going to take their turn that round. If they take their turn in any other phase, they take 4 STRESS at the start of that turn and are no longer predictable.

    During one of their predicted turns, the predictable character can clear this effect with a MIND save as a minor action .

    Extra Features

    Balance VOLLEY SKILL MANA1 RANGE = SCOPE (12/12/15)
    The Mindreaver chooses twocharacters within RANGE . They can move all Stress from one of the characters to the other.

    This weapon auto-hits GRAPPLED targets.

    On Hit:

    The target loses 1 MP .

    On Crit:

    The target loses all of their MP .

    Hamper

    VOLLEY

    +2/4/6 VS A-DEF

    RANGED SPELL ATTACK AETHERIC, INDIRECT RANGE = SCOPE (12/12/15) 2/3/4 STRESS

    On Hit: The target must make a MIND save. Failure: They are DISARMED or SILENCED until the end of their next turn (Mindreaver's choice).

    Mind Spike VOLLEY +2/4/6 VS A-DEF

    RANGED SPELL ATTACK AETHERIC, INDIRECT RANGE = SCOPE (12/12/15) 2/3/4 STRESS

    This attack deals +2 Stress to BREAKING targets.

    Focused

    TRAIT

    1/turn , the Mindreaver can take 1 STRESS to reroll an attack, check, or save.

    Pain

    CHANNEL

    SKILL MANA 1, RECHARGE 5+ RANGE = SCOPE (12/12/15)

    On Release: A character within RANGE takes 2 STRESS and must make a MIND save. Failure: They are STUNNED, DISARMED, AND SILENCED until the end of their next turn. Success: They are STUNNED until the end of their next turn.

    MIRAGE

    Mirages are illusionists that create false images around the battlefield.

    TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3
    Size: 1 Save Target: 11 Size: 1 Save Target: 14 Size: 1 Save Target: 17
    Armor: 0 Initiative: 2 Armor: 0 Initiative: 2 Armor: 0 Initiative: 2
    Scope: 10 Scope: 10 Scope: 10
    ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES
    Bulk: -1 Mind: 0 Bulk: -1 Mind: 1 Bulk: -1 Mind: 1
    Agility: 1 Magic: 2 Agility: 2 Magic: 3 Agility: 4 Magic: 4
    ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES
    HP: 10 Stress Cap: 6 HP: 12 Stress Cap: 6 HP: 14 Stress Cap: 6
    Dodge: 10 A-Def: 10 Dodge: 14 A-Def: 14 Dodge: 18 A-Def: 18
    Speed: 6 MP: 3 Speed: 6 MP: 4 Speed: 7 MP: 5

    M irages are battlefield illusionists, experts in altering the perceptions of their enemies. Invisibility and misdirection are their defensive tools, allowing them to befuddle foes by manipulating positioning. Mirages are hard to hit, and can REDIRECT the rare successful hit against them. Abilities that deal automatic damage and Discord are effective against these lowHP enemies.

    Base Features

    Confusion VOLLEY +1/2/3, +1 VS A-DEF RANGED SPELL ATTACK AETHERIC, INDIRECT RANGE = SCOPE (10/10/10) 2 STRESS

    On Hit: The target treats all enemies as having soft cover until the end of their next turn.

    On Crit: The target treats all enemies as having hard cover until the end of their next turn.

    Displacement

    TRAIT

    The Mirage is INVISIBLE . This effect is suppressed when they are STUNNED , and when they take damage they cease to be INVISIBLE until the start of their next turn.

    Redirect SKILL MANA 1 REACTION (1/ROUND)

    Trigger: A character within RANGE 3 (including the Mirage) is hit by an attack.

    Effect: The target switches places with another character within RANGE 3 of them, and that character takes the hit instead. This counts as forced movement and teleportation . If either character is an enemy, that character must make a MAGIC save. Success: This effect fails.

    Phantasm Terrain

    SKILL

    CHANNEL

    ARCING, MANA 1 RANGE = SCOPE (10/10/10)

    On Channel: The Mirage chooses 4 free spaces within RANGE that aren't adjacent to each other and creates illusions in each. These illusions last as long as the Mirage is channeling. Enemies that enter one of these spaces take 2 STRESS , after which the illusion is removed from the space.

    On Release: Enemies that are adjacent to an illusion take 2 STRESS and are SLOWED until the end of their next turn. The Mirage can then make the spaces either:

    • normal terrain
    • SIZE 1 pieces of hard cover
    • difficult terrain
    • dangerous terrain ( AGILITY , 5 FORCE ).

    Extra Features

    MINOR ACTION

    RANGE = SCOPE (10/10/10)

    Conceal

    SKILL

    MANA 1

    An ally within RANGE becomes INVISIBLE until the end of their next turn.

    Endless Maze

    SPELL

    CHANNEL

    RANGE = SCOPE (10/10/10)

    On Release: An enemy within RANGE takes 2/3/4 STRESS , is MARKED , and is BLINDED until cleared. Characters BLINDED by this ability can attempt to clear it by allowing the Mirage to control their standard movement , which counts as forced movement. On a turn in which they do so, they can make a MIND save at the end of that turn. Success: They clear the BLINDED condition.

    Flicker Blade

    FIGHT

    MELEE WEAPON

    REACH 2

    +1/3/5, +1 VS DODGE

    LIGHT BLADE

    3/5/7 PHYSICAL

    On Attack: If the Mirage isn't IMMOBILIZED or SLOWED , they can switch places with the target, teleporting both of them. This counts as inflicting forced movement on the other character.

    Invisibility Field

    SKILL

    While the Mirage is INVISIBLE , adjacent allies have soft cover .

    Replace

    SKILL

    MANA 2, SUMMON

    RANGE = SCOPE (10/10/10)

    Decoy Illusion ( SIZE = target's SIZE , HP 1, DODGE/ADEF 10, SPEED 0 ) .

    An ally within RANGE can move up to their SPEED , and a decoy illusion is created in their starting space. The target becomes HIDDEN. This lasts for as long as the decoy is in play and the target remains within RANGE 10 of it.

    Reveal Position SPELL

    CHANNEL

    RANGE = SCOPE (10/10/10)

    On Release: The Mirage chooses up to two allies within RANGE , or the Mirage and up to one ally. The Mirage can either swap their places with each other, which counts as teleportation , or teleport both characters 4 spaces.

    VOLLEY

    MIRAGE TEMPLATES

    Mirages shouldn't be combined with the Mini-Boss template. The extra Wounds and Overstress offered by that template leads to excessively survivable characters when paired with constant invisibility.

    Momentum

    OVERLORD

    The Overlord is a high-flying threat, keeping tabs on enemies below them while softening them up with magical attacks.

    TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3
    Size: 1 Save Target: 11 Size: 1 Save Target: 14 Size: 1 Save Target: 18
    Armor: 0 Initiative: 2 Armor: 0 Initiative: 2 Armor: 0 Initiative: 2
    Scope: 15 Scope: 15 Scope: 20
    ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES
    Bulk: -1 Mind: 1 Bulk: -1 Mind: 2 Bulk: -1 Mind: 3
    Agility: 0 Magic: 2 Agility: 1 Magic: 3 Agility: 1 Magic: 5
    ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES
    HP: 10 Stress Cap: 8 HP: 10 Stress Cap: 9 HP: 10 Stress Cap: 10
    Dodge: 8 A-Def: 12 Dodge: 10 A-Def: 15 Dodge: 11 A-Def: 18
    Speed: 6 MP: 4 Speed: 7 MP: 5 Speed: 8 MP: 6

    O verlords hover high above the battlefield, marking enemies for destruction. With their magical prowess, speed, and ability to fly, they remain as far away as possible to keep themselves safe while channeling their powerful abilities. Overlords are protected from melee attacks while flying, but are vulnerable if any enemy can bypass that defense or the penalty to ranged attacks inflicted by NIMBUS .

    Base Features

    Stressful Gaze SPELL MANA 1

    CHANNEL

    RANGE = SCOPE (15/15/20)

    Extra Features

    TRAIT

    Nimbus

    When an ally within SCOPE consumes a MARK , they can shift up to their SPEED .

    Hailstorm

    SPELL

    ARCING

    RANGE = SCOPE (15/15/20), BLAST 1

    On Channel: This AOE is a zone of difficult terrain that lasts as long as the Overlord is channeling. On Release: All characters within the zone must make an AGILITY save. Failure: They take 8/9/10 LUNAR and are SLOWED until the end of their next turn. Success: They take 4/5/5 LUNAR .

    CHANNEL

    VOLLEY +1/2/3 VS A-DEF

    RANGED SPELL ATTACK

    AETHERIC, INDIRECT

    RANGE = SCOPE (15/15/20)

    4/6/8 PHYSICAL

    On Hit: The target receives +2 to all ranged attacks until the end of their next turn.

    Uprising SPELL MANA 1

    MINOR ACTION

    RANGE = SCOPE (15/15/20)

    An ally within RANGE gains FLYING until the end of their next turn.

    SKILL REACTION (1/ROUND)

    Aerial Punishment

    Trigger: An enemy makes a melee attack against the Pegasus.

    Effect: The Pegasus attacks them after their attack resolves.

    Divine Gate

    VOLLEY

    +2/4/6 VS A-DEF

    RANGED SPELL ATTACK AETHERIC, INDIRECT

    RANGE = SCOPE (10/10/10) 1 STRESS

    Sky Warrior

    SKILL

    When the Pegasus critically hits, they can clear a condition from themselves or an ally within RANGE 5 . Additionally, 1/round , the Pegasus deals +1d6 bonus damage on a critical hit .

    Unicorn Lance FIGHT +1/2/3, +1 VS DODGE MELEE WEAPON MAIN LONGARM REACH 2 5/7/9 ASTRAL

    On Crit: The target is BLINDED until the end of their next turn.

    On Hit: 1/turn until the end of the target's next turn, whenever they make an attack, they take Stress equal to the distance between them and their attacked target.

    P R O T E C T O R

    Protectors are heavily armored guardians that position themselves in the way of attacks meant for their allies.

    TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3
    Size: 2 Save Target: 10 Size: 2 Save Target: 12 Size: 2 Save Target: 14
    Armor: 3 Initiative: 1 Armor: 3 Initiative: 1 Armor: 4 Initiative: 1
    Scope: 10 Scope: 10 Scope: 10
    ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES
    Bulk: 2 Mind: 0 Bulk: 3 Mind: 1 Bulk: 5 Mind: 2
    Agility: -1 Magic: 1 Agility: -1 Magic: 2 Agility: -1 Magic: 2
    ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES
    HP: 15 Stress Cap: 5 HP: 20 Stress Cap: 6 HP: 25 Stress Cap: 8
    Dodge: 7 A-Def: 6 Dodge: 7 A-Def: 6 Dodge: 7 A-Def: 6
    Speed: 4 MP: 3 Speed: 4 MP: 3 Speed: 4 MP: 4

    P rotectors are defensive units focused on taking damage on behalf of their allies. They are best positioned near vulnerable units, like support units or those that CHANNEL . Because Protectors need to be as close as to their allies as possible, altering their positioning is one way enemies can bypass many of their abilities.

    Base Features

    DEFEND

    Escort

    SKILL

    Until the start of the Protector's next turn, whenever an adjacent ally moves, the Protector can move along with them up to the Protector's SPEED (4/4/4) , staying adjacent to the ally. If the ally continues to move further, the Protector is left behind.

    Shield Wall

    SUPPORT ITEM

    MAIN

    MANA 1

    The Protector provides the benefits of cover for their allies as if they were a piece of hard cover . The Protector can use the BRACE action for 1MP .

    Brace

    DEFEND

    The Protector gains resistance to all damage until the start of their next turn.

    Dodge: 12 A-Def: 8 Dodge: 15 A-Def: 9 Dodge: 18 A-Def: 10
    Speed: 6 MP: 1 Speed: 6 MP: 1 Speed: 6 MP: 1

    Smoke Bomb MINOR ACTION SUPPORT ITEM LIGHT RECHARGE 5+

    Trap Master

    The Rogue creates a BLAST 1 zone centered on themselves. Characters fully inside the zone are INVISIBLE . The zone lasts until end of the Rogue's next turn.

    TRAIT

    The Rogue does not trigger Traps , and can automatically disarm them as a minor action . Additionally, they can automatically unlock locks .

    S H A R P S H O O T E R

    Sharpshooters are deadly foes that can kill from a great distance with pinpoint shots.

    TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3
    Size: 1 Save Target: 10 Size: 1 Save Target: 12 Size: 1 Save Target: 14
    Armor: 0 Initiative: 3 Armor: 0 Initiative: 3 Armor: 0 Initiative: 3
    Scope: 20 Scope: 20 Scope: 25
    ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES
    Bulk: -1 Mind: 1 Bulk: 0 Mind: 1 Bulk: 0 Mind: 2
    Agility: 2 Magic: 0 Agility: 3 Magic: 1 Agility: 5 Magic: 1
    ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES
    HP: 10 Stress Cap: 5 HP: 12 Stress Cap: 5 HP: 14 Stress Cap: 6
    Dodge: 10 A-Def: 8 Dodge: 12 A-Def: 8 Dodge: 14 A-Def: 8
    Speed: 5 MP: 3 Speed: 5 MP: 3 Speed: 5 MP: 3

    S harpshooters are dangerous marksmen, able to eliminate enemies with great precision from extreme distances. They can take their time to line up a shot, delivering massive damage if not contested. Cover can mitigate some of the Sharpshooter's strongest effects, so try to position them where enemies will be exposed when approaching.

    Base Features

    Compound Bow VOLLEY +2/4/6, +1 VS DODGE RANGED WEAPON HEAVY BOW ARCING RANGE 25 7/10/13 PHYSICAL

    Sniper Shot

    SKILL CHANNEL

    On Channel: The Sharpshooter selects an enemy within line of sight. While channeling this ability, they cannot use their COMPOUND BOW .

    Quiver

    SUPPORT ITEM

    LIGHT

    MANA 1

    The Sharpshooter changes the damage of their COMPOUND BOW to Physical, Astral, Lunar, or Force. This lasts until the Sharpshooter uses this ability again.

    Sky Shot

    On Release: The Sharpshooter attacks the target with their COMPOUND BOW . If they do not have cover against the Sharpshooter, the attack deals +5 damage on a hit.

    TRAIT

    The Sharpshooter gains +1 against FLYING targets. Additionally, FLYING targets hit by a ranged attack from the Sharpshooter lose FLYING .

    Extra Features

    Ghillie Suit SUPPORT ITEM LIGHT MANA 1

    MINOR ACTION

    The Sharpshooter becomes INVISIBLE until the start of their next turn.

    Annihilation Launcher

    VOLLEY +2/4/6 VS DODGE

    RANGED WEAPON

    HEAVY MAGITECH

    RELOADING

    ARCING,

    RANGE 25, BLAST 1

    5/7/9 FORCE

    FREE ACTION

    Spectral Arrow SUPPORT ITEM MAIN RECHARGE 5+

    When the Sharpshooter attacks with their COMPOUND BOW , they can do so with LINE 25 instead of its RANGE .

    Scan Movement SKILL REACTION (1/ROUND)

    Trigger: An enemy within line of sight ends a movement without cover against the Sharpshooter.

    Seeker Shot SKILL MANA 1

    FREE ACTION

    The Sharpshooter's next COMPOUND BOW attack ignores all .

    Steady Shot

    TRAIT

    If the Sharpshooter hasn't moved since the start of their last turn, they gain +1 on their next ranged attack.

    Effect: The Sharpshooter attacks the target with a ranged weapon.

    Specters are incorporeal beings that can phase through solid objects and drain energy from other creatures.

    SHARPSHOOTER TEMPLATES

    Be cautious when giving Sharpshooters the Minion template, as Minions output the same amount of damage as non-Minions, and Sharpshooters can deal lots of damage safely at range.

    S P E C T E R

    TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3
    Size: 1 Save Target: 12 Size: 1 Save Target: 15 Size: 1 Save Target: 18
    Armor: 0 Initiative: 3 Armor: 0 Initiative: 3 Armor: 0 Initiative: 3
    Scope: 10 Scope: 10 Scope: 10
    ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES
    Bulk: -2 Mind: 2 Bulk: -2 Mind: 3 Bulk: -2 Mind: 4
    Agility: 1 Magic: 1 Agility: 2 Magic: 2 Agility: 3 Magic: 3
    ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES
    HP: 14 Stress Cap: 8 HP: 16 Stress Cap: 9 HP: 18 Stress Cap: 10
    Dodge: 8 A-Def: 10 Dodge: 10 A-Def: 11 Dodge: 12 A-Def: 12
    Speed: 5 MP: 4 Speed: 5 MP: 4 Speed: 6 MP: 4

    S pecters are ghostly controllers with the ability to move through terrain. Fighting a Specter is a tiring exercise, as they can easily vanish or move across a map. These apparitions go wherever they want, staying close to enemies they think can't hit them or staying at range and hampering movement. Reduce their MP to stop them from disappearing or using REFORM , or hit them with damage that isn't affected by their invisibility.

    Base Features

    MINOR ACTION

    Ethereal Shift SPELL MANA 1

    The Specter becomes INVISIBLE until the start of their next turn.

    Frighten SKILL

    A character within RANGE must make a MIND save. Failure: They take 3/4/5 STRESS and are unable to voluntarily move closer to the Specter until the end of their next turn.

    Spellshields are trained to counter and weaken enemy spellcasters while sheltering their own allies with magical shields.

    S P E L L S H I E L D

    TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3
    Size: 2 Save Target: 10 Size: 2 Save Target: 13 Size: 2 Save Target: 16
    Armor: 1 Initiative: 1 Armor: 1 Initiative: 1 Armor: 2 Initiative: 1
    Scope: 10 Scope: 12 Scope: 15
    ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES
    Bulk: 0 Mind: 0 Bulk: 1 Mind: 0 Bulk: 2 Mind: 1
    Agility: 0 Magic: 2 Agility: 0 Magic: 4 Agility: 0 Magic: 5
    ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES
    HP: 18 Stress Cap: 10 HP: 21 Stress Cap: 12 HP: 24 Stress Cap: 14
    Dodge: 7 A-Def: 12 Dodge: 8 A-Def: 15 Dodge: 9 A-Def: 18
    Speed: 4 MP: 5 Speed: 4 MP: 6 Speed: 4 MP: 7

    S pellshields are specialized anti-spell defenders. ARCANUM SHIELD lets them split damage with nearby allies, while MANA DRAIN and their extra features disrupt the spellcasting abilities of their foes. Spellshields can safely be aggressive against enemy spellcasters, but should be wary of MP -draining effects.

    Base Features

    REACTION

    On Hit: The target loses 2 MP and the Spellshield regains MP equal to the amount lost.

    Spellward SPELL MANA 2

    DEFEND

    RANGE = SCOPE (10/12/15)

    Arcanum Shield

    SUPPORT ITEM

    HEAVY

    MANA 1

    Trigger: An ally within RANGE 3 takes Physical, Astral, Lunar, or Force (after ARMOR and resistance ).

    Effect: The Spellshield takes half the damage, and the ally takes the other half.

    Magic Resistance

    TRAIT

    The Spellshield has resistance to damage and Stress from spells .

    The Spellshield chooses an ally within RANGE . 1/round , the Spellshield can trigger ARCANUM SHIELD for that character at any range. Only one character can be targeted by this effect at a time.

    Extra Features

    Aethercaster

    VOLLEY +1/2/3 VS DODGE

    RANGED WEAPON HEAVY BOW HOMING

    RANGE 15

    1 FORCE

    This weapon deals bonus damage equal to the target's current MP .

    Break Spell

    SKILL

    REACTION

    Trigger: An enemy in SCOPE uses a CHANNEL action.

    Effect: The Spellshield attacks them with a spell attack or weapon.

    Improved Mana Drain

    TRAIT

    The Spellshield can gain MP from MANA DRAIN in excess of their maximum MP .

    Pain Prod

    MELEE WEAPON

    REACH 1

    FIGHT +2/4/6 VS DODGE

    MAIN CLUB

    2/3/4 ASTRAL

    On Hit: The target receives +2 to concentration saves triggered by this attack.

    Reflect SPELL MANA 1

    REACTION (1/ROUND)

    Trigger: A spell attack misses the Spellshield or an ally within RANGE 3 .

    Silence SPELL

    CHANNEL

    RANGE = SCOPE (10/12/15)

    On Release: One enemy within RANGE takes 3/4/5 STRESS and is SILENCED until cleared.

    Effect: The Spellshield reflects the spell back at the caster, auto-hitting them with it.

    Swarms are a deadly mass made of countless smaller parts. They move as one, covering the battlefield.

    TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3
    Size: 2 Save Target: 11 Size: 2 Save Target: 14 Size: 2 Save Target: 17
    Armor: 0 Initiative: 4 Armor: 0 Initiative: 4 Armor: 0 Initiative: 4
    Scope: 8 Scope: 8 Scope: 8
    ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES
    Bulk: 2 Mind: -2 Bulk: 3 Mind: -2 Bulk: 4 Mind: -2
    Agility: 2 Magic: 0 Agility: 3 Magic: 1 Agility: 4 Magic: 2
    ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES
    HP: 20 Stress Cap: 6 HP: 25 Stress Cap: 7 HP: 30 Stress Cap: 8
    Dodge: 8 A-Def: 6 Dodge: 10 A-Def: 7 Dodge: 12 A-Def: 8
    Speed: 4 MP: 3 Speed: 4 MP: 3 Speed: 4 MP: 4

    S warms are controllers that force enemies to reposition in order to get away from them. Each Swarm is surrounded by a SWARM BODY , which can cause negative effects for enemies caught inside. They can also summon Drones over a great distance, driving enemies into new positions. Swarms are vulnerable to damage from AOEs, and their area of control shrinks once they're BLOODIED .

    Base Features

    VOLLEY

    MANA 1, SUMMON

    Swarm Body TRAIT The Swarm is surrounded by a BURST 2 zone. Allies within the zone gain soft cover . Enemies that start their turn in the zone or enter it for the first time during their turn take 2/3/4 STRESS . The zone is suppressed while the Swarm is STUNNED .

    Drones

    SUPPORT ITEM

    HEAVY

    RANGE = SCOPE (8/8/8)

    Drone ( SIZE 1/2 , HP 1 , DODGE/A-DEF 10 , SPEED 0 )

    The Swarm summons a drone within RANGE . The drone emits a BURST 1 zone. Enemies are DAZED while within the zone.

    The Swarm can have any number of drones in play at a time.

    Surging Host

    FIGHT +2/4/6 VS DODGE

    MELEE WEAPON MAIN CLUB PIERCING

    REACH 1, CLOSE BLAST 1

    3/4/5 PHYSICAL

    On Hit: The target becomes MARKED .

    Additionally, the following effects apply based on the Swarm's WOUND CAP and OVERSTRESS CAP :

    • WOUND or OVERSTRESS CAP 1 : While the Swarm is BLOODIED , they become SIZE 1 (unless they were already smaller) and the zone becomes BURST 1 .
    • WOUND or OVERSTRESS CAP 2+ : When the Swarm has taken Wounds/Overstresses equal to half their relevant cap, they become SIZE 1 (unless they were already smaller) and the zone becomes BURST 1 .

    Swarm Form

    TRAIT

    SWARM TEMPLATES

    The Swarm is VULNERABLE to Discord and damage from AOEs . Additionally, attempts to GRAPPLE the Swarm automatically fail, and the Swarm can automatically break free from grapples as a free action .

    Applying the Minion template to Swarms can create a combat scene filled with zones, which can make it hard to keep track of things.

    Extra Features

    FIGHT

    Choking Swarm

    SKILL

    MANA 1, RECHARGE 5+

    The Swarm chooses DISARMED or SILENCED . All enemies in the Swarm's SWARM BODY zone must then make a BULK save. Failure: They take 2 STRESS and gain the chosen condition until the end of their next turn. Success: They take 2 STRESS .

    Clutching Swarm SKILL GRAPPLE

    The Swarm chooses one of the following:

    • The Swarm can GRAPPLE a character within their SWARM BODY zone. On a hit, the swarm can slide them to any free space adjacent to the Swarm.
    • One of the Swarm's drones makes a normal GRAPPLE .

    Crawling Swarm TRAIT MINOR ACTION

    The Swarm moves one of their drones up to 2 spaces, ignoring line of sight.

    CONTROLLER

    Titans are slow, lumbering, unstoppable enemies that are devastating at close range.

    Infestation

    VOLLEY

    +2/4/6 VS DODGE

    RANGED WEAPON LIGHT CLUB HOMING

    RANGE 12

    2/3/4 STRESS

    On Hit: The target becomes infested . For the duration, they take 1/2/3 DISCORD whenever they attack. This effect can be applied multiple times, increasing the Discord dealt by +1 each time. The infested character can clear this effect by succeeding on a BULK save as a minor action , or by performing the REFRESH action.

    Obscuring Swarm

    TRAIT

    Allies fully within the Swarm's SWARM BODY zone can HIDE as a minor action . Enemies are BLINDED while within the zone.

    Shredding Swarm

    TRAIT

    When an enemy starts their turn in the Swarm's SWARM BODY zone, they take 1/2/3 PHYSICAL and must make a BULK save. Failure: They are SUNDERED until the end of their next turn.

    T I T A N

    TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3
    Size: 3 Save Target: 11 Size: 3 Save Target: 13 Size: 3 Save Target: 15
    Armor: 2 Initiative: 7 Armor: 2 Initiative: 7 Armor: 2 Initiative: 7
    Scope: 5 Scope: 5 Scope: 5
    ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES
    Bulk: 4 Mind: 0 Bulk: 6 Mind: 1 Bulk: 6 Mind: 2
    Agility: -2 Magic: 0 Agility: -2 Magic: 0 Agility: -1 Magic: 1
    ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES
    HP: 15 Stress Cap: 6 HP: 20 Stress Cap: 6 HP: 25 Stress Cap: 6
    Dodge: 6 A-Def: 6 Dodge: 8 A-Def: 8 Dodge: 10 A-Def: 10
    Speed: 3 MP: 3 Speed: 3 MP: 3 Speed: 4 MP: 4

    T itans are massive, frightening units. They move slowly towards enemies, delivering devastating attacks with their GIGA HAMMER when close enough. They are geared toward keeping enemies close and punishing them for that proximity. Titans are considered controllers because the PCs need to keep them at range or hinder them, otherwise the Titan will cause significant damage.

    Base Features

    HEAVY

    Armor Plating

    SUPPORT ITEM

    The Titan has resistance to Physical, Astral, Lunar, and Force from characters within RANGE 3 .

    Full Attacker

    TRAIT

    The Titan can FULL ATTACK .

    Giga Hammer FULL ATTACK +1/2/3, +1 VS DODGE MELEE WEAPON HEAVY CLUB SLOW REACH 2 10/14/16 PHYSICAL

    Heavy

    TRAIT

    The Titan is immune to forced movement from smaller characters.

    Unstoppable

    TRAIT

    The Titan can end their turn sharing spaces with objects and terrain that are smaller than them. If they end their turn sharing spaces with other characters, those characters are pushed to the nearest unoccupied spaces outside of the Titan's spaces.

    On Hit: The target must make a BULK save. Failure: They are STUNNED until the end of their next turn.

    Extra Features

    TRAIT

    Danger Zone

    Enemies that start their turn adjacent to the Titan take 3/4/5 PHYSICAL , or twice as much damage if the enemy is BREAKING .

    Earthcracker

    SUPPORT ITEM MAIN ENCHANTMENT

    This Enchantment applies to the Titan's GIGA HAMMER . On an attack with this weapon, enemies in a BURST 1 AOE around the target must make an AGILITY save. Failure: They take 5/7/8 PHYSICAL .

    Gravity Pull SPELL MANA 1

    MINOR ACTION BURST 3

    All enemies in the AOE must make a BULK save. Failure: They are pulled to the closest free space adjacent to the Titan.

    Intimidation SKILL

    PHASE

    SKIRMISH

    RANGE = SCOPE (5/5/5)

    A target within RANGE must make a MIND save. Failure: They take 2/3/4 STRESS and are SLOWED until the end of their next turn. Success: They take 1/2/3 STRESS .

    Marked for Destruction

    TRAIT

    Enemies that start their turn adjacent to the Titan are MARKED .

    Pain Conversion

    SKILL REACTION

    Trigger: The Titan takes damage or Stress .

    Effect: The Titan gains +1 on their next GIGA HAMMER attack. This effect stacks until the Titan next attacks with the GIGA HAMMER .

    TITAN TEMPLATES

    Titans should not be given the Mini-Boss template. The best way for beacons to handle a titan is to take them out before they can get close. The Mini-Boss template makes that very unlikely to happen, which can result in an unfun situation to deal with.

    Vultures are flying menaces that nimbly avoid attacks while dragging their victims around.

    V U LT U R E

    TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3
    Size: 1 Save Target: 11 Size: 1 Save Target: 14 Size: 1 Save Target: 17
    Armor: 0 Initiative: 3 Armor: 0 Initiative: 3 Armor: 0 Initiative: 3
    Scope: 10 Scope: 10 Scope: 10
    ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES SCORES SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES
    Bulk: -2 Mind: 0 Bulk: -2 Mind: 1 Bulk: -2 Mind: 2
    Agility: 4 Magic: 0 Agility: 5 Magic: 1 Agility: 6 Magic: 2
    ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES
    HP: 8 Stress Cap: 6 HP: 8 Stress Cap: 6 HP: 10 Stress Cap: 6
    Dodge: 12 A-Def: 8 Dodge: 15 A-Def: 10 Dodge: 18 A-Def: 12
    Speed: 7 MP: 2 Speed: 7 MP: 2 Speed: 8 MP: 3

    V ultures are aerial harassment units. They move fast and easily avoid attacks with their BARREL ROLL reaction. They specialize in moving their foes out of position, putting them into dangerous situations. Attacking a Vulture multiple times in quick succession can wear them down, and their A-DEF is much lower than their DODGE .

    Base Features

    Evasive Maneuvers

    Extra Features

    TRAIT

    Reaction attacks against the Vulture automatically miss unless the attacker spends 1 FOCUS .

    Heavenly Chains

    SPELL

    VOLLEY

    MANA 1, SUMMON RANGE = SCOPE (10/10/10)

    Pillar of Chains ( SIZE 1/2 , HP 5 , DODGE/A-DEF 10 , SPEED 0 )

    The Vulture summons a pillar of chains within RANGE . Any enemy that starts their turn adjacent to the pillar must make a BULK save. Failure: They are IMMOBILIZED and WEAKENED for as long as they remain adjacent to the pillar.

    Lost Fog VOLLEY +2/4/6 VS A-DEF RANGED SPELL ATTACK AETHERIC, INDIRECT RANGE = SCOPE (10/10/10), BLAST 1 4/5/6 LUNAR

    On Attack: This AOE is a zone. Characters fully within it are BLINDED while inside, and line of sight can't be drawn through it. This effect lasts until the Vulture uses this spell again or is defeated.

    Lure

    SKILL

    ARCING

    CHANNEL

    RANGE = SCOPE (10/10/10)

    On Release: A character within RANGE takes 2/3/4 PHYSICAL , is SILENCED until the end of their next turn, immediately moves their SPEED straight toward the Vulture, and must make a MIND save. Failure: The target is DAZED until cleared. While DAZED , all of their movement during their turn must be directly toward the Vulture, and they must move at least 1 space during their turn (if possible).

    The Vulture can't use this ability while they are STUNNED or SILENCED , and gaining either condition ends all of this ability's existing effects.

    Skitter Bomb MINOR ACTION SUPPORT ITEM MAIN MANA 1, SUMMON RANGE = SCOPE (10/10/10)

    Skitter Bomb ( SIZE 1/2 , HP 3 , DODGE/A-DEF 10 , SPEED 3 )

    The Vulture creates a skitter bomb within RANGE . They can detonate a skitter bomb as a free action , but not on the turn in which it was created. When it detonates, all characters in a BURST 1 AOE must make an AGILITY save. Failure: They take 8/10/12 FORCE . Success: They take 4/5/6 FORCE .

    Vacuum Generator

    SUPPORT ITEM

    MAIN

    RECHARGE 5+

    VOLLEY

    LINE 10

    Characters in the AOE must make a BULK save, starting with the characters furthest away. Failure: They take 4/6/8 FORCE and are pushed to the furthest free space in the line. Success: They take 2/3/4 FORCE and are pushed 1 .

    Warmages are spellcasters ready for explosive combat. Their powerful magic can destroy whole armies.

    TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 1 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 2 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3 TIER 3
    Size: 1 Save Target: 12 Size: 1 Save Target: 14 Size: 1 Save Target: 16
    Armor: 0 Initiative: 2 Armor: 0 Initiative: 2 Armor: 0 Initiative: 2
    Scope: 20 Scope: 20 Scope: 20
    ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES ABILITY SCORES
    Bulk: -1 Mind: 1 Bulk: -1 Mind: 2 Bulk: -1 Mind: 3
    Agility: 0 Magic: 2 Agility: 0 Magic: 4 Agility: 1 Magic: 5
    ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES ATTRIBUTES
    HP: 10 Stress Cap: 10 HP: 10 Stress Cap: 11 HP: 12 Stress Cap: 12
    Dodge: 8 A-Def: 12 Dodge: 8 A-Def: 14 Dodge: 10 A-Def: 17
    Speed: 4 MP: 6 Speed: 4 MP: 7 Speed: 4 MP: 8

    W armages are area-based spellcasters that rain fire and destruction from afar. Their channeled abilities can quickly destroy groups of enemies, and their BATTLEMAGE trait allows them to maintain their concentration in the face of enemy attacks at the cost of MP . They have little defense against physical attacks, so try to close the distance quickly and spread out.

    Base Features

    Explosion

    VOLLEY

    +2/4/6 VS A-DEF

    RANGED SPELL ATTACK

    ARCING

    RANGE = SCOPE (20/20/20), BLAST 1 4/6/8 FORCE

    Extra Features

    CHANNEL

    Cone of Cold

    RANGE = SCOPE (20/20/20)

    Chain Death

    SPELL

    MANA 1

    On Release: The Warmage chooses up to three different characters within RANGE , designating them as Target 1 , Target 2 , and Target 3 . Draw straight lines from Target 1 to Target 2, and from Target 2 to Target 3. These characters, and any characters within one of these lines, must make a MAGIC save. Failure: They take 6/7/8 LUNAR and are WEAKENED until they regain any amount of HP . Success: They take 3/4/4 LUNAR and are WEAKENED until the end of their next turn.

    SPELL

    CHANNEL

    CLOSE BLAST 3

    On Release: All characters in the AOE take 8/10/12 LUNAR and must make a BULK save. Failure: They are IMMOBILIZED until the end of their next turn. While IMMOBILIZED by this ability, targets are VULNERABLE to Physical damage .

    Escape

    SPELL MANA 1

    The Warmage teleports up to 6 spaces.

    Mind Fog VOLLEY +2/4/6, +1 VS A-DEF

    RANGED SPELL ATTACK AETHERIC, INDIRECT RANGE = SCOPE (20/20/20) 2/3/4 STRESS

    On Hit: The target is DAZED and treats the Warmage as INVISIBLE until they clear DAZED .

    STANDARD MOVEMENT

    Mirror Self SPELL MANA 2, SUMMON RANGE = SCOPE (20/20/20)

    MINOR ACTION

    Illusory Copy ( SIZE = WARMAGE'S SIZE , HP 5 , DODGE/A-DEF 10 , SPEED 0 )

    The Warmage creates an illusory copy of themselves in a free space within RANGE . Whenever the Warmage uses an ability, they can determine line of sight, RANGE , and cover from the copy's position instead of their own.

    Wave of Death SPELL MANA 1

    On Release: All enemies within the AOE must make a MAGIC save. Failure: They take 10/15/20 LUNAR and are unable to regain HP until the end of their next turn. Success: They take 5/8/10 LUNAR .

    12: UNIVERSAL NPC FEATURES

    Universal features can be given to any NPC as extra features.

    Amorphous

    This NPC receives the following benefits:

    • They ignore difficult terrain .
    • They can move through spaces smaller than themselves without squeezing .
    • They can move through the spaces of other characters and end their turn in these spaces.

    Armor

    SUPPORT ITEM LIGHT ARMOR

    +1 ARMOR .

    Backup Melee

    FIGHT +2/4/6 VS DODGE

    MELEE WEAPON

    LIGHT ANY TYPE

    REACH 1 4/5/6 DAMAGE

    Darkvision

    TRAIT

    This NPC ignores penalties from low visibility and doesn't treat HIDDEN characters as INVISIBLE within low visibility areas.

    Deadly Attacks

    TRAIT

    This NPC's weapon attacks gain Reliable 3/4/5 .

    Double Crossbow VOLLEY +1/2/3 VS DODGE

    RANGED WEAPON MAIN BOW

    RANGE 8 / REACH 3 4 PHYSICAL

    This weapon can make two attacks at a time, or three attacks at T3.

    Enhanced

    TRAIT

    This NPC gains +1 on all checks and saves with one ability score ( BULK , AGILITY , MAGIC , or MIND ).

    Flight

    This NPC has flight.

    TRAIT

    TRAIT

    Full Attacker

    This NPC can FULL ATTACK .

    Guardian

    TRAIT

    TRAIT

    This NPC's allies gain the benefits of cover as if the NPC were a piece of hard cover.

    Heavy Blaster

    VOLLEY

    RANGED WEAPON

    HEAVY ANY TYPE

    ARCING,

    RELOADING

    RANGE 8, BLAST 2

    5/7/9 DAMAGE

    Immunity

    TRAIT

    This NPC is immune to either a damage type or Stress.

    Incorporeal

    TRAIT

    This NPC gains the following benefits:

    • They ignore ENGAGEMENT and don't cause ENGAGEMENT .
    • They can move through the spaces of other characters, objects, and terrain, but can't end their turn in these spaces.
    • They ignore difficult terrain and dangerous terrain .

    Juggernaut

    TRAIT

    This NPC is immune to the DAZED and SLOWED conditions.

    Long Weapon

    VOLLEY +1/2/3 VS DODGE

    RANGED WEAPON

    MAIN ANY TYPE

    RELIABLE

    2/3/4

    RANGE 10

    5/6/7 DAMAGE

    Mana Hunter

    TRAIT

    1/turn when this NPC critically hits with a weapon or spell attack, the target loses 1 MP .

    Mana Rich

    TRAIT

    This NPC gains +2 MAXIMUM MP .

    Opportune Weapon

    FIGHT

    MELEE WEAPON MAIN ANY TYPE

    +1/2/3, +2 VS DODGE

    REACH 2 4 DAMAGE

    This weapon deals double damage to PRONE , IMMOBILIZED , STUNNED , or SUNDERED targets.

    Phalanx

    TRAIT

    This NPC has +1 on all attacks, checks, and saves when adjacent to at least one ally.

    Recurring

    TRAIT

    When this NPC is defeated, they always retreat or escape to fight another day.

    Regenerator

    TRAIT

    This NPC regains 1/2/3 HP at the start of each of their turns, as long as they have at least 1 HP .

    Resistance

    TRAIT

    This NPC has resistance to either a damage type or Stress.

    Seeker Blast

    VOLLEY +1/2/3 VS A-DEF

    RANGED SPELL ATTACK AETHERIC, HOMING

    RANGE = SCOPE, BLAST 1 4/5/6 DAMAGE

    Tough

    This NPC gains +5 MAXIMUM HP .

    Trample

    TRAIT

    TRAIT

    When this NPC moves, they ignore ENGAGEMENT and can move through spaces occupied by enemies of their SIZE or smaller. They deal 2/3/4 DAMAGE to enemies they move through, 1/turn per character.

    13: temPlateS

    aPPendiceS

    Incompatible

    TRAIT

    This template can't be combined with other templates that have this trait.

    One Hit

    TRAIT

    The Minion has 1 HP and 1 STRESS CAP , and this cannot be increased by any means. They cannot have more than 1 Wound or Overstress. When they take any damage or Stress not caused by themselves, they are defeated.

    Additionally, when the Minion succeeds on a save, they take no damage or Stress from the effect, even if it would normally deal damage or Stress on a successful save .

    V E T E R A N

    Veterans are experienced units. They are harder to defeat than most enemies, and have a wide array of unique features.

    Base Features

    TRAIT

    Enhanced

    The Veteran gains +1 on all checks and saves with one ability score ( AGILITY , BULK , MAGIC , or MIND ).

    Sturdy

    TRAIT

    The Veteran gains +1 WOUND CAP and +1 OVERSTRESS CAP .

    Veteran Traits

    TRAIT

    The Veteran can select one Veteran extra feature per tier. The Veteran cannot choose extra features from this list outside of this trait.

    13: TEMPLATES

    Templates are sets of features that can be applied to NPCs. NPCs can have multiple templates, although some templates specify that they can't be combined with others.

    Templates provide base features and, in most cases, optional extra features . An NPC with a template gets the listed base features and adds the extra features to the pool of extra features you can choose from, except where stated otherwise.

    MECHANICAL TEMPLATES

    Mechanical templates are those that affect the balance of combat scenes. The MINION , VETERAN , ELITE , and MINI-BOSS are all mechanical templates.

    Minions are cannon fodder - weak individually, but threatening in groups. They only cost 1/4 of a point from the NPC budget. Despite their limitations, Minions do the same amount of damage as normal NPCs, so be careful when combining them with certain NPC types, like artillery NPCs.

    Base Features

    Extra Features

    TRAIT

    Fanatical

    REACTION

    Trigger: An adjacent ally would take damage or Stress , and the Minion isn't STUNNED or IMMOBILIZED .

    Effect: The Minion takes the damage instead.

    Caster

    Extra Features

    TRAIT

    Full Attacker

    The Veteran deals +2 Stress with weapons and spells that deal Stress.

    Dangerous

    The Veteran can use the Reroll Table .

    Deadly Crit

    TRAIT

    TRAIT

    The Veteran deals +1d6 damage on critical hits .

    First Initiative

    The Veteran has INITIATIVE 1.

    Fighter

    TRAIT

    TRAIT

    The Veteran deals +2 damage with weapons and skills that deal damage.

    Fortified Armor SUPPORT ITEM HEAVY ARMOR

    The Veteran can FULL ATTACK .

    Keen Eye

    TRAIT MINOR ACTION

    The Veteran uses SEARCH .

    Last Stand

    TRAIT

    When the Veteran takes their last Wound or Overstress, they are not defeated. Instead, they will become defeated at the end of their next turn. Nothing can prevent them from being defeated at that time.

    Legendary Resistance

    TRAIT

    The Veteran makes all wound and overstress rolls twice and takes either result.

    Resurgence

    SKILL

    LIMITED 1

    FREE ACTION

    The Veteran regains all HP , clears all Stress and conditions, and regains all MP .

    +2 ARMOR . Additionally, the Veteran takes -1 damage from Discord.

    E L I T E

    Elites are units capable of taking on small groups by themselves. They can act multiple times each round.

    Base Features

    Extra Actions TRAIT The Elite takes two turns each round. To determine when their second turn occurs, take their INITIATIVE and add 5. If this gives them INITIATIVE 9+ , roll over the remainder starting from 1. So, with INITIATIVE 5 , the Elite would take their first turn during PHASE and their second turn during PHASE (5 + 5 = 10, rolled over to 2).

    Enhanced

    TRAIT

    The NPC gains +1 on all checks and saves with one ability score ( BULK , AGILITY , MAGIC , or MIND ).

    Incompatible

    TRAIT

    This template can't be combined with other templates that have this trait.

    Sturdy

    TRAIT

    The Elite gains +1 WOUND CAP and +1 OVERSTRESS CAP .

    Elite Traits

    The Elite selects an additional extra feature.

    TRAIT

    TRAIT

    Focused Concentration TRAIT

    While channeling, the Mini-Boss can't lose concentration . They take 2 Stress whenever they would lose concentration .

    Full Attacker

    The Mini-Boss can FULL ATTACK .

    Invulnerability SPELL

    TRAIT

    DEFEND

    RECHARGE 6+

    The Mini-Boss gains immunity to all damage (but not Stress). Whenever they would take damage, they lose 1 MP , and they can't regain MP while this effect is active. This effect ends when the Mini-Boss reaches 0 MP or when they end it as a free action .

    Keen Eye TRAIT MINOR ACTION

    The Mini-Boss uses SEARCH .

    Last Stand

    TRAIT

    When the Mini-Boss takes their last Wound or Overstress, they are not defeated. Instead, they will become defeated at the end of their next turn. Nothing can prevent them from being defeated at that time.

    Masterwork Armor

    SUPPORT ITEM MAIN ARMOR

    +4 ARMOR . The Mini-Boss can exceed the usual maximum of 4 ARMOR .

    Additionally, whenever the Mini-Boss takes damage, they then reduce their ARMOR by -1 , to a minimum of 0 (after reducing damage from ARMOR ). At the start of each round, they regain all ARMOR lost this way.

    Masterwork Melee Weapon

    FIGHT

    MELEE WEAPON

    MAIN ANY

    +2/3/4, +1 VS DODGE

    TYPE RELIABLE 6/8/10

    REACH 2

    6/8/10 FORCE

    This weapon deals bonus damage equal to the highest die result on any dice rolled.

    Masterwork Ranged Weapon VOLLEY RANGED WEAPON MAIN ANY +2/4/6, +1 VS DODGE TYPE RELIABLE 4/6/8 RANGE 20 4/6/8 FORCE

    This weapon deals bonus damage equal to the highest die result on any dice rolled.

    Meteor Swarm

    CHANNEL

    SPELL ARCING, RECHARGE 5+

    RANGE = SCOPE

    On Channel: The Mini-Boss creates four BLAST 2 zones within RANGE , which can't overlap. These zones last while the Mini-Boss is channeling.

    On Release: Characters within one or more of the zones must make an AGILITY save. Failure: They take 14/17/20 ASTRAL . Success: They take 7/9/10 ASTRAL . Each character only takes this damage 1/turn.

    Resurgence SKILL LIMITED 1

    FREE ACTION

    The Mini-Boss regains all HP and MP , and clears all Stress and conditions.

    Seize Initiative

    TRAIT

    The Mini-Boss's INITIATIVE becomes 1 and 6 , replacing their original INITIATIVE scores.

    Unfazed

    TRAIT

    The Mini-Boss is immune to the DAZED , STUNNED , and WEAKENED conditions.

    Slam

    VS DODGE

    6/8/10 PHYSICAL

    Sting

    Web

    SUPPORT ITEM

    RECHARGE 5+

    RANGE 5

    A character within RANGE must make an AGILITY save. Failure: They are IMMOBILIZED . The target can clear this condition by making a BULK save as a minor action .

    C E L E S T I A L

    Celestials are angelic or divine creatures, associated with healing effects and the element of light.

    Extra Features

    CHANNEL

    Banish

    SPELL

    MANA 1, RECHARGE 5+

    RANGE = SCOPE

    On Release: An enemy within RANGE must make a MAGIC save. Failure: Until the end of their next turn, they can neither affect nor be affected by other characters. They ignore ENGAGEMENT and obstructions from other characters, cannot deal or take damage or Stress, and so on. They are still affected by existing Traps and Summons . Success: They are SLOWED and WEAKENED until the end of their next turn.

    Celestial Nature

    TRAIT

    The Celestial has resistance to Astral damage .

    Divine Light

    RANGE = SCOPE, BLAST 1 4/6/8 ASTRAL

    MINOR ACTION

    A character within RANGE gains 5 TEMP HP .

    Flight

    The Celestial has flight .

    Healing Aura

    Allies that start their turn partly within this Aura regain 2 HP .

    Unblemished

    The Celestial is immune to Discord .

    TRAIT

    C O N S T R U C T

    Constructs are artificial creatures like robots and homunculi. They are powered by mana, and without it they enter a power-saving mode.

    Base Features

    Artificial

    TRAIT

    The Construct is immune to the DAZED condition.

    Magic-Dependent

    TRAIT

    While the Construct has 0 MP , they are permanently SLOWED and have +1 on attacks, checks, and saves.

    Extra Features

    Integrated Weapons TRAIT

    One of the Construct's weapons becomes Innate .

    Magic Resistance

    TRAIT

    The Construct has resistance to all damage and Stress from spells .

    Poison Breath

    SKILL RECHARGE 5+

    PHASE BRAWL

    CLOSE BLAST 2

    Enemies in the AOE must make a BULK save. Failure: They take 3/4/5 DISCORD and are DAZED until cleared. Success: They take 1/2/3 DISCORD .

    Reinforced Plating

    +1 ARMOR .

    Scanners

    SUPPORT ITEM LIGHT

    SUPPORT ITEM LIGHT

    The Construct ignores the INVISIBLE status and can SEARCH as a minor action .

    Shielded

    SUPPORT ITEM MAIN

    The Construct provides cover for their allies as if they were a piece of hard cover .

    D E M O N

    Demons are creatures of chaos. Their unpredictability is their greatest asset.

    Base Features

    Chaotic Resistance

    TRAIT

    The Demon has resistance to Physical, Astral, Lunar, or Force , randomly decided.

    Extra Features

    Blood Hunt

    TRAIT

    The Demon gains +1 on attacks against BLOODIED targets.

    Death Burst

    TRAIT

    When the Demon is defeated, they explode in a BURST 1 area. Characters in the AOE take 3/4/5 DAMAGE of the same type that the Demon has resistance to from their Chaotic Resistance trait.

    TRAIT AURA 2

    Fear Aura

    Enemies that start their turn in this Aura take 2 STRESS and must make a MIND save. Failure: They are DAZED until the end of their next turn.

    Flaming Whip FIGHT +1/3/5, +1 VS DODGE MELEE WEAPON HEAVY LONGARM PULL 2 REACH 3 5/6/7 ASTRAL

    Frenzy

    TRAIT

    The Demon gains +1 on attacks while BLOODIED .

    Improved Chaos

    TRAIT

    The Demon's Chaotic Resistance grants resistance to a second type of damage.

    Painful Aura

    TRAIT AURA 2

    Enemies that start their turn in this Aura take 2/3/4 DAMAGE of the type that the Demon has resistance to from their Chaotic Resistance trait.

    Spikes

    SUPPORT ITEM LIGHT

    Characters that start their turn GRAPPLED with the Demon take 2 PIERCING PHYSICAL .

    Fiendish Resistance

    Devils use the power of rules, order, and contracts to gain power, manipulating the law to their benefit. Devils prefer to play in a game rigged to their benefit.

    Base Features

    TRAIT

    The Devil has resistance to Astral or Lunar damage .

    Extra Features

    Bad Deal

    REACTION (1/ROUND)

    SPELL

    MANA 1

    Trigger: An enemy within SCOPE uses the Reroll Table .

    Effect: They gain +1 on the reroll.

    Charm

    VOLLEY

    SPELL MANA 1, RECHARGE 5+

    RANGE = SCOPE

    An enemy within RANGE must make a MIND save. Failure: They take 2/3/4 STRESS and a further 2 STRESS whenever they target the Devil with a hostile effect. This effect lasts until the Devil is defeated or until the target succeeds on a MIND save as a minor action . Success: They take 1/2/3 STRESS .

    Contract SUPPORT ITEM MAIN

    RANGE = SCOPE

    Enemies within RANGE have their Reroll Table options changed to the following:

    • Strain: You take 1D6 STRESS .
    • Endanger: Y ou become MARKED and SUNDERED . You can't use this option if you are both MARKED and SUNDERED. This doesn't count as a condition that you've given yourself.
    • Overextend: You can only choose this option if you are adjacent to an enemy or within REACH of an enemy's weapon. The enemy can choose one of the following, which resolves before you reroll:
    • They make an OPPORTUNITY ATTACK against you with +2 .
    • They deal 6 PHYSICAL to you as a reaction .

    On Hit: The Devil regains 4/6/8 HP .

    Hellfire

    VOLLEY +1/2/3, +1

    VS A-DEF

    RANGED SPELL ATTACK

    MANA 1

    RANGE = SCOPE 2/3/4 DISCORD

    On Hit: The target automatically fails their next MAGIC check to clear Discord.

    Invisibility

    MINOR ACTION

    SPELL

    MANA 1

    The Devil becomes INVISIBLE until the start of their next turn.

    13: temPlateS

    aPPendiceS

    Dire creatures are larger and stronger than their ordinary counterparts. Dire creatures tend to be Beasts, but anything can take on a Dire form.

    Base Features

    Dire Size

    TRAIT

    The Dire gains +1 SIZE and gains +1 on BULK checks and saves.

    Frenzy

    TRAIT

    The Dire gains +1 on attacks while BLOODIED .

    Extra Features

    Armor Spikes

    SUPPORT ITEM MAIN

    +2 ARMOR . Additionally, characters that hit the Dire with a melee attack while adjacent to them take 2 PHYSICAL .

    Ferocious Bite FIGHT +1/3/5, +1 VS DODGE MELEE WEAPON HEAVY CLUB

    REACH 1 6/8/10 PHYSICAL

    On Hit: The target is GRAPPLED by the Dire.

    Backed into a Corner SKILL REACTION

    Trigger: The Dire becomes BLOODIED .

    Effect: The Dire makes a melee weapon attack, even if they would be defeated.

    Rip

    SKILL

    1/round when the Dire critically hits with a melee attack, the target must make an AGILITY save. Failure: One of their weapons or support items are destroyed (target's choice).

    Tear

    SKILL

    1/round when the Dire hits with a melee weapon attack, the target becomes SUNDERED after the attack until the end of their next turn.

    Tough

    The Dire gains +5 MAXIMUM HP .

    314

    TRAIT

    D R A C O N I C

    Draconic creatures are either types of dragons or creatures with draconic features, like scales, claws, wings, and breath attacks.

    Base Features

    Chromatic Scales

    TRAIT

    The Draconic gains either Astral or Lunar resistance .

    Natural Weapons FIGHT +2/4/6 VS DODGE MELEE WEAPON HEAVY CLUB REACH 1 5/7/9 PHYSICAL

    This weapon can be used while DISARMED .

    Extra Features

    Breath Weapon

    PHASE

    BRAWL

    SKILL RECHARGE 5+

    LINE 10 OR CLOSE BLAST 2

    The AOE type is chosen when this ability is selected, and its damage is of the same type that the Draconic has resistance to from their Chromatic Scales trait. On Use: All characters in the AOE must make an AGILITY save. Failure: They take 8/10/12 ASTRAL / LUNAR . Success: They take 4/5/6 ASTRAL / LUNAR .

    Change Size MINOR ACTION SPELL MANA 1

    The Draconic changes their SIZE to any SIZE between 1/2 and 3 , or changes back to their normal SIZE .

    Swallow PHASE BRAWL +2/4/6 VS DODGE MELEE SKILL ATTACK RECHARGE 5+

    The Draconic attacks an adjacent character smaller than them. On a success, the target is swallowed and moved into the Draconic's space. They are DAZED and IMMOBILIZED , and can't target or be targeted by anything outside the Draconic's spaces. They move when the Draconic moves. Swallowed creatures can make a BULK save as a standard action during any phase to break free. Otherwise, they are freed when the Draconic takes a Wound or Overstress.

    Draconic Bloodline TRAIT MANA X

    When the Draconic rolls a recharge die, they can increase the result by +1 for every MP spent.

    Energy Aura

    TRAIT AURA 1

    Flight

    Characters that start their turn in this Aura take 2/3/4 DAMAGE of the same type that the Draconic has resistance to from their CHROMATIC SCALES trait. This effect is suppressed while the Dragon is STUNNED .

    The Draconic has flight .

    E L E M E N TA L

    TRAIT

    Elementals are creatures tied to a specific type of element, like fire or ice. Their physical forms are often made of this element.

    Base Features

    Elemental Nature

    Death Burst

    The Elemental chooses either Astral or Lunar. They gain immunity to the chosen damage type and are VULNERABLE to the other. All of their Elemental abilities that deal damage use the chosen damage type.

    TRAIT

    When the Elemental is defeated, they unleash a burst of energy in a BURST 2 AOE. Enemies in the AOE must make an AGILITY save. Failure: They take 4/5/6 DAMAGE . Success: They take 2/3/3 DAMAGE .

    Elemental Burn

    SUPPORT ITEM LIGHT

    The Elemental's weapon attacks deal +2 Discord .

    Elemental Nimbus

    SKILL AURA 2

    The Elemental's enemies treat this Aura as difficult terrain .

    Energy Absorption

    TRAIT

    When the Elemental takes damage that they are immune to, they regain an amount of HP equal to the damage they would have taken. Any HP beyond their maximum becomes TEMP HP .

    Energy Form

    TRAIT

    The Elemental can move through the spaces of other characters, ignoring ENGAGEMENT. 1/turn , they can deal 2/3/4 DAMAGE to an enemy they move through.

    Environmental Merge

    TRAIT

    The Elemental is immune to dangerous terrain and gains hard cover while within it.

    Extra Features

    TRAIT

    Mounted creatures ride something into battle, whether a horse, a motorcycle, or something stranger. They are fast but vulnerable when knocked down. You can flavor this as the Mounted NPC being temporarily dismounted.

    Base Features

    Hard Fall TRAIT
    The Mounted is VULNERABLE while PRONE .
    Mounted Speed TRAIT
    The Mounted gains +2 SPEED .

    Gallop

    TRAIT

    The following apply to the Mounted:

    • The Mounted can only move in straight lines. They can still interrupt and resume their movement to perform actions, but must continue in a straight line.
    • They can't climb .
    • As a minor action , they can RUSH but must choose the 'ignore ENGAGEMENT and do not provoke reactions ' option.

    Extra Features

    Mount's Weapon

    FIGHT +1/2/3 VS DODGE

    MELEE WEAPON

    LIGHT CLUB

    REACH 1

    3/4/5 PHYSICAL

    As long as they aren't BLOODIED or BREAKING , the Mounted can attack with this weapon as a minor action .
